entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 24.
